      • getSites

        public Collection<RssSite> getSites()
        Specified by:
        getSites in interface RssConfigurationManager
        Returns:
        A list of all RSS sites currently configured. If none are configured an empty list should be returned.

      • getRssFeed

        protected RssFeed getRssFeed(Feed dbFeed)

      • updateSite

        protected void updateSite(DbRssSite rssSite)
        Syncs DB and crawler state for one RssSite. Triggered by RssSite.doUpdate().
        Parameters:
        rssSite - The rss site begin updated. That site must be in the state UPDATING.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the rssSite is not in the state RssSiteState.UPDATING

      • supportsRuntimeChanges

        public boolean supportsRuntimeChanges()
        Description copied from interface: RssConfigurationManager
        If true, then the configuration may change at runtime. Setting this to true causes the RssCrawlController to periodically reread the configuration.
        Specified by:
        supportsRuntimeChanges in interface RssConfigurationManager
        Returns:
        True if it supports changes at runtime, false otherwise
